channel.title: You And Me (with precious mae)
channel.description: This track has been on hold for some time. So my friend and I decided to make a lyrics for it (She did all the lyrics). So last night she just sent me the demo version then she recorded fully in her bedroom. And I was trying to fix the in Ableton since the track was a bit off the bpm but I decided to keep the Auxy version with it since I forgot all the key for it. The piano sound was actually a sample that I made with my MIDI and drag it to AUXY. The track came out good but still has it flaws. So this is the outcome of it. [You And Me (with precious mae)](https://soundcloud.com/bacs-molina17-183209610/you-and-me-with-precious) ![9D01E289-B657-480A-B19C-E8A2C09B00FA|500x500](upload://xACNK6lRMonAMbnAGBpPwJU9EbK.jpeg)

item.title: You And Me (with precious mae)
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Great stuff. Everything’s spot on (imo), apart from the drums.

Vocal is fantastic. Serious talent.

I recommend revisiting the drums. Not sure if it’s the kit sounds or the beat structure, but doesn’t feel like it’s quite working to me. The touches of swing/syncopation lack subtlety - especially when the whole vibe is so subtle.

It’s close though. Really close.

Read full topic

item.title: You And Me (with precious mae)
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
packfaces:

And I was trying to fix the in Ableton since the track was a bit off the bpm but I decided to keep the Auxy version with it since I forgot all the key for it.

If you export as an Ableton Live Set, it exports the stems and the midi, all together as an Ableton project.

Also look into ‘warping’ in Ableton. Should help bring things together.

Read full topic

item.title: You And Me (with precious mae)
item.dc:creator: packfaces
item.description:
This track has been on hold for some time. So my friend and I decided to make a lyrics for it (She did all the lyrics). So last night she just sent me the demo version then she recorded fully in her bedroom. And I was trying to fix the in Ableton since the track was a bit off the bpm but I decided to keep the Auxy version with it since I forgot all the key for it. The piano sound was actually a sample that I made with my MIDI and drag it to AUXY. The track came out good but still has it flaws. So this is the outcome of it.
You And Me (with precious mae)
